alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:04PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern La Paz and north central Yuma Counties through 245 PM MST... At 204 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Yuma Proving Ground to 20 miles southeast of Kofa Wildlife Refuge. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Canyon. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 68 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
